description: Math retirement gate policy. Enforces that modules lacking decision linkage or classified as research in governance cannot remain in the production manifest without an explicit waiver. Provides staged deprecation path and migration rules.

retirement_criteria.description: A module is a retirement candidate if ANY of the following are true.

rules.name: governance_mismatch
rules.description: Module is classified 'research' in math_governance.json but listed in production_modules of production_kernel_manifest.v1.json.

rules.name: no_decision_linkage
rules.description: Module has linkage_status != 'Production' in runtime_math_linkage.v1.json but is in production manifest.

rules.name: no_measurable_benefit
rules.description: Module has no A/B benchmark evidence of measurable improvement over simpler alternative. Evaluated by bd-3tp math value proof.
rules.enforcement: Flagged but non-blocking until bd-3tp evidence is available

deprecation_stages.description: Staged deprecation path for modules being retired from production.

stages.description: Module is in production manifest and compiled by default.
Module is marked for retirement. Still compiled but emits compile-time warning. Grace period begins.
Module moved behind research feature gate. No longer in production binary by default.
Module source deleted. Only reachable via git history.

waiver_policy.description: Waivers allow a module to remain in production despite meeting retirement criteria.
waiver_policy.escalation: Expired waivers without renewal automatically trigger deprecation stage transition.

current_assessment.description: Current state of retirement candidates based on governance classification vs production manifest.

rc1_candidates.description: Research-classified modules currently present in production manifest (governance_mismatch).

rc2_candidates.description: Modules with non-Production linkage status still in production manifest.
rc2_candidates.note: All modules currently have linkage_status='Production' in the linkage ledger. This will be reassessed when linkage statuses are updated to match governance tiers.

rc3_candidates.description: Modules lacking A/B benchmark evidence (pending bd-3tp).
rc3_candidates.note: No A/B evidence exists yet. This criterion becomes active after bd-3tp delivers.

production_compliant.description: Modules classified as production_core or production_monitor in governance AND in production manifest.

migration_notes.description: Migration to research_only manifest routing is complete for current governance classification.

summary.waiver_coverage: none (all research modules already routed to research_only_manifest)
